item.title: WAHA 2025.9 - ChatWoot 1.1, NOWEB 7.0-rc, Sessions Filters
item.description:
🧩 ChatWoot 1.1

ChatWoot integration graduates to v1.1, adding conversation control, CSAT surveys, richer language templates, and safer contact handling.

item.title: WAHA 2025.8 - Ignore Chats, Send Poll Vote, and more!
item.description:
🖥️ Sessions - Ignore Chats

You can now ignore incoming chats at the engine level — Status, Groups, and Channels — to keep your processing focused and clean.

item.title: WAHA 2025.7 - ChatWoot App, Dashboard i18n, and more!
item.description:
🧩 ChatWoot App

Meet the first built-in app in WAHA - 🧩 ChatWoot App!

WAHA now provides a built-in app to integrate your WhatsApp account with ChatWoot, eliminating the need to run n8n or use other third-party products!

item.title: WAHA 2025.6 - Security in WAHA Core, Message Edit Event, and Media Conversion
item.description:
🆕 What’s New?

🔒 Security in WAHA Core

WAHA Core now comes with robust, built-in security features!
You can protect your API with an API Key - and now, for even greater security, you can store only the hash of your key using WAHA_API_KEY=sha512:{HASH}.
This means your API key is never stored in plain text, reducing the risk if your environment variables are exposed.

item.title: WAHA 2025.5 - Presence, Polls, Labels and More!
item.description:
🆕 What’s New?

✅ Presence (WEBJS)

In WEBJS, you can now use the ✅ Presence API and Events to track your customers’ online status!

item.title: 🚨 WAHA Security Alert
item.description:
🚨 WAHA Security Alert

We’ve recently seen a disturbing trend: users running WAHA with the API publicly exposed and without any form of protection.

item.title: WAHA 2025.3
item.description:
We’re excited to roll out WAHA 2025.3!

GOWS 1.0

GOWS Engine just got its 1.0 moment!

Here’s what’s new:

  • Enable Link Previews - #763
  • Delete Status Message - #754
  • Delete Message - #796
  • Edit Message - #797
  • Reply To Message - #799
  • Add filename on /api/sendFile - #853
  • Extract replyTo - #876

NOWEB Stability

If you faced any issues with the NOWEB engine, like #821 , #860 , #869 we have fixed them in this release!
